evidence.source_document: Order Approving and Entering Consent Decree

extracted.value: 08/31/20: Settlement reached and approved by Court.

evidence.text: In the event of any dispute over the language, requirements or construction of this Agreement, the Parties agree to meet and confer in an effort to achieve a mutually agreeable resolution.

extracted.value: In case of disputes, the Parties agree to meet and confer to resolve them.

evidence.text: The Agreement terminates upon HRRJ’s showing that it has achieved durable compliance.

extracted.value: until durable compliance achieved: Settlement obligations terminate.

evidence.text: The Jail will provide pre-service and annual in-service training ... within six months of the Effective Date.

extracted.value: within six months of Effective Date: training obligations completed.

evidence.text: The Agreement is enforceable only by the Parties.

extracted.value: The Agreement is enforceable only by the Parties.

evidence.text: The Agreement terminates upon HRRJ’s showing that it has achieved durable compliance.

extracted.value: The Agreement terminates upon HRRJ achieving durable compliance.

evidence.text: The Monitor may be removed for good cause by the Court at any time.

extracted.value: The Monitor may be removed for good cause by the Court.

evidence.text: The Jail will pay the Monitor an amount per year to be agreed upon by the Parties for performing all of the Monitor’s duties under this Agreement.

extracted.value: The Jail will pay the Monitor an amount per year to be agreed upon by the Parties.

evidence.text: The Jail will provide pre-service and annual in-service training, ... within six months of the Effective Date, ...

extracted.value: The Jail will provide pre‑service and annual in‑service training to staff within six months of the Effective Date.

evidence.text: The Jail will increase security staffing to ensure that there are sufficient staff to escort medical staff during pill pass and during any visits to prisoners in restrictive housing, ...

extracted.value: The Jail will increase security staffing to ensure sufficient personnel for medical and other duties.

evidence.text: In the event of any dispute over the language, requirements or construction of this Agreement, the Parties agree to meet and confer in an effort to achieve a mutually agreeable resolution.

extracted.value: In case of disputes, the Parties agree to meet and confer to resolve them.

evidence.source_document: Order Approving and Entering Consent Decree
evidence.text: ORDER APPROVING AND ENTERING CONSENT DECREE ... the Agreement is APPROVED and the Agreement's terms are hereby incorporated into this Order as if fully set forth herein. The Court retains complete jurisdiction of this matter to enforce this Order and the terms of the incorporated Agreement until the Defendants have fulfilled their obligations therein.
